full_summary:
# Tender Notice
## EE519-250042: Replacement of the Lighting System Docks 11-12 at Cap-aux-Meules

## Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) on behalf of Transport Canada is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the Replacement of the Lighting System Docks 11-12 at Cap-aux-Meules.

## Key Details
* **Reference Number**: WS4540533619-Doc4578357340
* **Publication Date**: May 9, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 18, 2024, 2:00 PM
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: N/A
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Category**: Construction Services - CNST ( Construction Services - Not Building)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Relevant Information
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Region**: Quebec (except NCR)
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

## Contact Information
* Veronique Hae Ok Pichette (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:veroniquehaeok.pichette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Notice URL
* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19650427?extsite=MTk2NTA0MjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
